pages.name: Entrance
pages.text: The party arrives at a forest. They see three paths from the entrance.

choices.desc: The party decides to go left.
The party decides to take the middle path.
The party goes right.

pages.name: Left Path
pages.text: The party comes to a dead end, but there are some interesting items on the ground.

choices.desc: The party looks at the rock. Nothing really happens and the party goes back to the entrance.
The party looks at the log. They notice a secret path behind the log!

pages.name: Left Path Secret
pages.text: The party finds themselves in a dark part of the forest. No one has been here in a long time.

choices.desc: The party gets scared and leaves before anything bad happens.
The party rests for a few minutes and restores their health.

pages.name: Left Path Secret Battle
pages.text: The party is ambushed by some enemies while they rested!

choices.desc: The party readies for battle!
The party runs as fast as they can back to the entrance.

pages.name: LPS Do Battle
pages.text: The party wins the battle (TO DO: actually do a battle here). The party then heads back to the entrance.

choices.desc: The party leaves this dark area and goes back to the entrance to the forest.

pages.name: Middle Path
pages.text: The party comes across a river that seems impassable.

choices.desc: The party heads back to the start.

pages.name: Right Path
pages.text: The party finds themselves on a well-traveled path. This must be the path to the city! They continue on until they reach another fork in the road.

choices.desc: The party goes left.
The party goes right.
The party goes back to the entrance

pages.name: Right Path 2
pages.text: The party is back at the second fork.

choices.desc: The party goes back to the village.
The party goes right.
The party goes back to the entrance.

pages.name: Right Left
pages.text: The party arrives at a small forest village.

choices.desc: The party goes into the village.

choices.displayText: Go back to the split path
choices.desc: The party goes back.

pages.name: Village
pages.text: The party arrives at the village (TODO: actually do the location scene)

choices.desc: The party leaves the village.

pages.name: Right Right
pages.text: The party arrives at a river that stops them from advancing any further.

choices.desc: The party drink some water and feels refreshed!

pages.name: Drink Water
pages.text: After drinking some water, the party decides to go back to the fork in the road.

choices.desc: The party leaves.
